channel.title: Linux on Classroom
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Classroom

item.title: Basic Linux
item.description: Overview Class Practical for Linux Basic Scripting Hello {Name} #!/bin/bash echo "Hello, $1" Output bash hello.sh Mentor Hello Mentor Age Check #!/bin/bash #user-input echo -n "Enter Your Age: " read VAR #function if [[ $VAR -gt 21 ]] then echo "You're Adult" else echo "Nope!" fi OutPut bash age.sh 19 Nope!
